metadata.title: CVE-2017-9105 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in adns before 1.5.2. It corrupts a pointer when a nameserver speaks first because of a wrong number of pointer dereferences. This bug may well be exploitable as a remote code execution.

criterions.comment: adns package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.6.0-2').
